title: Baby Carrier
description: rectangle with black borders; wide on side with nine spaced knotted piping on side edges; coarse embroidered goemetric horizontal pattern in magenta, purples, black, orange; center top bordered, red center with five additional knotted piping
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
